specific_issues.description:
Extending and preserving Davis - Bacon Act on all federal and federally assisted construction.
Support resolution to Federal Government shutdown and budget & debt crisis.
Oppose King Amendment to Military Construction Appropriations Bill (Davis Bacon repeal)
Job Creation
Small Business participation in public contracting matters
Support investments in industrial energy efficiencey, including combined heat and power (CHP) and waste heat recovery (WHR)
Support The Commercial Building Modernization Act
Support construction of net-zero, energy-efficient energy schools
Support reform for Multiemployer Pension Plans
Support for Commercial Buildings Energy Consumption Survey (CBECS)
Oppose efforts to weaken, eliminate energy efficiency performance standards for federal buildings.
Oppose amendment to Fair Labor Standards Act
Support Energy Savings and Industrial Competitiveness Act
Oppose anti-Davis-Bacon/anti-PLA Amendments
Support "Tenant Star" program of Better Buildings Act
Support Federal Buildings Energy Savings Act
Support The Home Owner Managing Energy Savings Act
Support The Construction Quality Assurance Act
Support expansion of retrofit loan programs, reforms to IRS Section 179D
Support GSA's Green Building Program to House, Senate Congressional Appropriations Committees
Support laws making it harder for employers to engage in misclassification of workers as independent contractors
Support Investment Tax Credit (ITC) reform legislation
Support procurement reforms and procedures impacting small buisnesses
Support funding for U.S. Dept. of Energy's Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy and U.S. Energy Information Administration
Submitted statement to House Education and Workforce Committee Subcommittee for hearings on Multiemployer Pension Plans address issues related to the Pension Protection Act
Support Smart Energy Act
Oppose Working Family Flexibility Act
Support action on tax, program efforts to increase natural industrial efficiency
Support Energy Efficient Schools
Support commercial building energy modernization deduction
Support Dept. of Energy's Commercial Buildings Energy Consumption Survey research and industry reporting
Support Administration's Better Buildings Initiative, endorse legislation reform - IRS Section 179D
Co-sponsored Congressional High Performing Builiding Caucus briefing, reception
Support high-efficiency built environment
Support high-efficiency industrial/manufacturing facilities
Support legislation to increase national energy efficiency in commercial buildings
Support Fostering Resilience to Terrorism Act of 2015 - H.R. 1945
Support Federal Government use of green building programs, particularly LEED green building rating system and the Enterprise Green Communities standard
Support Expanding Industrial Energy and Water Efficiency Incentives
Statement submitted for record: Support reform to create stronger employment and tax laws at state and federal level with more effective enforcement to eliminate possible payroll fraud and worker misclassification in construction industry
Support reducing carbon pollution from existing power plants through greater use of CHP, WHP
Support Jodran Cove, OR Energy Project to export liquified natural gas (LNG)
Support "Solutions Not Bailouts" proposal for multiemployer pension plan reform
Support The Terrorism Risk Insurance Act of 2002 Reauthorization Act
Support CHP, WHP in U.S. manufacturing
Support of Mechanical Insulation Installation Incentive Act
Support Energy Efficiency Improvement Act
Support introduction of Energy Savings and Industrial Competitiveness Act
Support The Renewable Energy Parity Act
Support Commonsense Construction Contracting Act
Support Construction Quality Assurance Act
Support Security in Bonding Act
Support the Energy Efficiency Tax Incentives Act
Support the Energy Savings and Industrial Competitiveness Act
Support the Power Efficiency and Resiliency (POWER) Act (HR 2657)
Support the Terrorism Risk Insurance Act of 2002 Reauthorization Act
Support Environmental Protection Agency's support for combined heat and power (CHP) in proposed new rules for power plants
Supplied comments of support for CHP and WHP (waste heat to power) on EPA's Standards of Performance of
Greenhouse Gas Emissions for New Stationary Sources - 79 Fed. Reg. 1430
Support the Energy Efficient Cool Roofs Act
Support the America's Small Business Tax Relief Act
Support Department of Energy's Weatherization Assistance Program (WAP) and the State Energy Program (SEP)
Oppose Anti Davis-Bacon Amendments
Support Building Energy Codes in the Energy and Water Appropriations Bill
Support Water in the 21st Century Act
Letter to Sen. Wyden (OR) - Support "Solutions Not Bailouts" proposal for multiemployer pension plans
Support extension of clean energy tax credits in Section 48
Comments submitted for Request for Information regarding Assisting Federal Facilities with Energy Conservation Technologies (AFFECT) Grant program; support extension of program to include CHP, WHP
Support extension of Section 179D tax deduction for energy efficient commercial and multifamily buildings
Oppose limiting withdrawal liability of a limited class of employers participating in multiemployer pension plans.
Support "Solutions Not Bailouts" proposal for multiemployer pension plan reform.
Support Energy Efficiency Improvement Act
Support reauthorizing of The Terrorism Risk Insurance Act of 2002
Support The Better Buildings Act
Oppose Flake amendment (FLAKE #103) to The Keystone Pipeline Act - S. 1
Support appropriate use of project labor agreements on public construction - oppose Government Neutrality in Contracting Act of 2015 - S. 71
Support America's Small Business Tax Relief Act of 2015 - H.R. 636
Support The Streamlining Energy Efficiency for Schools Act of 2015 - H.R. 756
Support the Energy Efficiency Improvement Act of 2015 - S. 535
Support Portman-Hirono Amendment #1731 to the National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA ) of FY 2016 - S. 1526
Oppose amendment to ban Project Labor Agreements (PLAs) on military construction projects and military family housing projects - S.A. 1719
Support the POWER Act of 2015 - S. 1516, H.R. 2657
Support efforts to advance energy efficiency in properties owned and supported by Dept. of Housing and Urban Development
Support The Energy Savings and Industrial Competitiveness Act of 2015 - H.R. 2177
Support The Job Creation through Energy Efficient Manufacturing Act of 2015 - S. 1275
Support he Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act for FY 2016
Include and support language in the National Defense Authorization Act of 2016, H.R. 1735, based on H.R. 1666, the Design-Build Efficiency and Jobs Act; H.R. 1444, the Commonsense Construction Contracting Act - the Hanna Amendment to H.R. 1735; and H.R. 838, the Security in Bonding Act - Section 839 of H.R. 1735
Support Davis-Bacon prevailing wage coverage as part of H.R. 2029
Support the "Death Tax Repeal Act of 2015" - S. 860, H.R. 1105
Support appropriate use of construction project labor agreements (PLA's) on public construction; oppose "Government Neutrality in Contracting Act of 2015" - S. 71, H.R. 1671
Support The Energy Savings and Industrial Competitiveness Act of 2015 - S. 720, H.R. 2177
Support The America's Small Business Tax Relief Act of 2015 - H.R. 636
Encourage Senate, House support of energy efficiency legislation within the context of more comprehensive legislation.
Support energy efficiency tax credits in the extension of expiring and expired tax provisions; in particular: 25C tax credit for certain non-business energy property; the 179D tax deduction for energy-efficient commercial and multifamily buildings; extension of 45L tax credit for new energy-efficient homes.
Support renewal of three energy-efficient building tax extenders that expired in 2014: Residential Energy-Efficient Tax Credit (IRC Sec. 25C), Energy-Efficient New Home Tax Credit (IRC Sec. 45L), and the Commercial Building Tax Deduction (IRC Sec. 179D)
Support Davis-Bacon Act, prevailing wage coverage/reject repeal amendment - H.R. 3763
Support extensions and updates of the Sec. 25C Non-business Energy Property Credit and the Sec. 17D Commercial Building Tax Deduction; extension of the 45L Energy Efficient Home Credit in any tax extender legislation considered by Congress by end of 2015
Support inclusion of substantial energy efficiency provisions in any end-of-year (2015) legislative package that addresses energy-related, funding, tax and authorization policies.
Support The Master Limited Partnership Parity Act of 2015 - S. 1656, H. R. 2883
Oppose Government Neutrality in Contracting Act of 2015 - H.R. 1671
Support extension and improvement of the production tax credit (PTC), investment tax credit (ITC), and residential tax incentives for multiple technologies.
Support composite plans/multiemployer pension plans.
Support Jordan Cove Energy Project to export liquefied national gas (LNG).

Support The America's Small Business Tax Relief Act of 2015 - H.R. 636
Encourage Senate, House support of energy efficiency legislation within the context of more comprehensive legislation.
Support energy efficiency tax credits in the extension of expiring and expired tax provisions; in particular: 25C tax credit for certain non-business energy property; the 179D tax deduction for energy-efficient commercial and multifamily buildings; extension of 45L tax credit for new energy-efficient homes.
Oppose "Government Neutrality in Contracting Act of 2015" - H.R. 1671
Support inclusion of substantial energy efficiency provisions in any end-of-year (2015) legislative package that addresses energy-related, funding, tax and authorization policies.
Support The Master Limited Partnership Parity Act of 2015 - S. 1656, H. R. 2883
Support extension and improvement of the production tax credit (PTC), investment tax credit (ITC), and residential tax incentives for multiple technologies.
Support state clean power plan compliance using energy efficiency.
